name: Moustache Sugar Skull Plush
description:
This quirky Sugar Skull moustache pillow is sure to raise a smile sat comfy on your sofa or snuggled into an armchair.

Made from hand cut felt with hand embroidered detailing.
This squishy skull is padded with a non removable wadding.
Measurements approx 22cm x 15cm.

name: Punk Rocker Sugar Skull Garland
description:
A colorful and quirky Punk Rocker Garland comprising of 8 little sugar skulls  complete with brightly coloured Mohawks and safety pin piercings!
But don't be put off by their rugged exteriors, these cheeky little characters are lightly padded making them soft and squishy on the inside!

Each skull measures approx. 12cm x 7cm.
They overall length of the garland is approx. 5ft.

Hand made in felt.

name: Day of the Dead Sugar Skull Garland
description:
A colorful and quirky Mexican Wedding Garland inspired by the Day of the Dead celebration.

This Sugar Skull decoration comprises of a total of 8 hand stitched and hand embroidered, lightly padded, male and female sugar skulls. In between each skull there are red and white layered love hearts.

Our male skulls come complete with large handle bar moustaches and our females with rosy red cheeks and matching flowers in their hair.

Hand cut and hand sewn.
Each little skull measures approx 10cm x 7cm.
Garland length approx. 5ft
Hand Made in felt.

name: Mexican Sugar Skull Paper Garland
description:
A Sugar Skull Garland comprising of 8 skulls constructed in heavy card stock. The layered design and cut out detailing gives a 3D effect which adds depth and shadow to each skull.

Available in a range of colors.

Each skull measures approx height 10cm x width 8cm x depth 1cm.
Garland length 5ft.

name: Swallow Brooch Pins
description:
Classic Old Skool style rockabilly swallow brooch pins.
This listing is for a matching pair of brooches.

The brooches are hand stitched in felt and lightly padded.
Each swallow measures approx 11cm x 10cm.
With brooch pin fastenings attached.
